workflow.description: Removes host record from IPAM. User can specify either host name or extensible attributes to search and remove host records, which have specified extensible attributes.

param.name: searchCriteria
param.description: Method to search host record to remove

param.name: dnsView
param.description: DNS view, in which host record resides

param.name: networkView
param.description: Network view, in which host record resides

param.name: searchEa1Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #1

param.name: searchEa2Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #2

param.name: searchEa3Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #3

param.name: searchEa4Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #4

param.name: searchEa5Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #5

param.name: searchEa6Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #6

param.name: searchEa7Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #7

param.name: searchEa8Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #8

param.name: searchEa9Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #9

param.name: searchEa10Comparison
param.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #10

attrib.name: attrFoundHost
attrib.description: Host record to remove, which was found in IPAM by name or IP address

attrib.name: attrFoundHosts
attrib.description: List of host records to remove, found in IPAM by name, IP address or extensible attributes

attrib.name: attrCurrentIndex
attrib.description: Index of current host record to remove

attrib.name: attrCurrentRef
attrib.description: Reference of current host record to remove

attrib.name: attrSearchEa1Comparison
attrib.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #1

attrib.name: attrSearchEa2Comparison
attrib.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #2

attrib.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #7

attrib.name: attrSearchEa8Comparison

workflow-item.name: item1
item2
workflow-item.script: //Generated by the system, cannot be edited return (searchCriteria == "Host name") ;

workflow-item.name: item4
workflow-item.script: //Generated by the system, cannot be edited return (searchCriteria == "IP address") ;

workflow-item.name: item6
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.infoblox.ipam").getHostByName(ipamConnection,hostName,dnsView) ;

bind.name: dnsView
bind.description: DNS view, in which the host record resides

workflow-item.description: Gets a host record by name in specified DNS view. If DNS view is not specified, then default DNS view will be used.

workflow-item.name: item7
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.infoblox.ipam").getHostByIP(ipamConnection,ipAddress,networkView) ;

bind.name: networkView
bind.description: Network view, in which the host record resides

workflow-item.description: Gets a host record by IP address in specified network view. If network view is not specified, then default network view will be used.

workflow-item.name: item5
workflow-item.description: Removes a host record from IPAM.

workflow-item.name: item3
workflow-item.script: //Generated by the system, cannot be edited return (searchCriteria == "Extensible attributes") ;

workflow-item.name: item11
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.infoblox.ipam").findHostsByEA(ipamConnection,searchEa1Definition,searchEa1Value,searchEa1Comparison,searchEa2Definition,searchEa2Value,searchEa2Comparison,searchEa3Definition,searchEa3Value,searchEa3Comparison,searchEa4Definition,searchEa4Value,searchEa4Comparison,searchEa5Definition,searchEa5Value,searchEa5Comparison,searchEa6Definition,searchEa6Value,searchEa6Comparison,searchEa7Definition,searchEa7Value,searchEa7Comparison,searchEa8Definition,searchEa8Value,searchEa8Comparison,searchEa9Definition,searchEa9Value,searchEa9Comparison,searchEa10Definition,searchEa10Value,searchEa10Comparison) ;

bind.name: searchEa1Comparison
bind.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #1

bind.name: searchEa2Comparison
bind.description: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #2

workflow-item.description: Searches for hosts in IPAM by specified extensible attributes.

workflow-item.name: item0
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console and the server log with level 'error'

workflow-item.name: item15
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console and the server log with level 'error'

workflow-item.name: item18
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.infoblox.ipam").getDefaultIpamConnection() ;
workflow-item.description: Returns a default connection to the IPAM server

workflow-item.name: item19
workflow-item.script: //Generated by the system, cannot be edited return (attrIpamConnection != null ) ;

p-param.name: dnsView
p-param.desc: DNS view, in which host record resides

p-param.name: networkView
p-param.desc: Network view, in which host record resides

p-param.name: searchEa1Definition
p-param.p-qual: (#searchEa1Definition==null || GetAction("com.infoblox.ipam.util","connectionContainsDefinition").call( #ipamConnection, #searchEa1Definition )) ? true : "IPAM connection does not contain this definition."

p-param.name: searchEa1Comparison
p-param.desc: Type of the comparison for extensible attribute #1
